alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wilcox and southeastern Crisp Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 842 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Amboy, or 8 miles north of Ashburn. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Arabi, Double Run, Wenona and Hatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
